net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators
Class SpecializationIndex

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.Calculator
        |
        +--net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.SpecializationIndex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, ICalculator
public class SpecializationIndex
extends Calculator
implements Constants

Calculates the SI (NORM * DIT) / NOM. Note that because NORM is configurable from preferences, the value of SI is indirectly influenced by preferences as well.

Author:
Frank Sauer
